price: [¡Oh, incrédulos!] Les presenté la Verdad [a través del Mensajero], pero la mayoría rechazaba la Verdad.
arabic: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
